refnamediv.refpurpose: volume computes the specific volume of humid air given the dry bulb temperature, the humidity and the total pressure

listitem.para: specific volume (in cu. m/kg of dry air)

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: volume computes the specific volume v (in cu. m/kg of dry air) of humid air given the dry bulb temperature Tdry (in K), the humidity W (in kg/kg of dry air) and the total pressure p (in Pa). By default, total pressure is assumed to be the atmospheric pressure at sea level (p = 101325). volume is a main function of the psychrometrics toolbox for Scilab.

refsection.title: Examples
